thread.title: Presidential Candidate & Former Senator Rick Santorum Reacts to Fellow Candidate Mike Huckabee saying President Obama’ s Iran Nuke Deal “Marches Israelis up to the Oven Doors.” Was Huckabee wrong? “No.”

title: Presidential Candidate & Former Senator Rick Santorum Reacts to Fellow Candidate Mike Huckabee saying President Obama’ s Iran Nuke Deal “Marches Israelis up to the Oven Doors.” Was Huckabee wrong? “No.”
